ai-ps3.8:1.2_0: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
ai-ps3.8:1.3_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-ps3.8:1.4_0: They meditate observing an aspect of the body—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
ai-ps3.8:1.5_0: Meditate observing an aspect of feelings ...
ai-ps3.8:1.7_0: They meditate observing an aspect of principles—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
ai-ps3.8:1.8_0: These are the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.”
ai-ps3.8:2.1_0: How do they meditate observing an aspect of the body?”
ai-ps3.8:2.2_0: It’s when someone passes away from the earth, not from the water.
ai-ps3.8:2.5_0: They’re repelled by relishing, but not repelled.
ai-ps3.8:2.8_0: Blue on impermanence, the perception of not-self in suffering gives up, and the perception of not-self. Being disillusioned, desire fades away, and cease.
ai-ps3.8:2.9_0: These are the seven body that they will pull up.
ai-ps3.8:2.12_0: Because of that mindfulness, that knowledge of the body, that’s how they proceed.
ai-ps3.8:2.14_0: “Those who revere the host of Kāsī.”
ai-ps3.8:3.1_0: And he distinguished the four kinds of development:
ai-ps3.8:3.2_0: So there they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that energy to develop mindfulness that has been developed.
ai-ps3.8:4.12_0: a mind of bones is impermanent, not lasting,
ai-ps3.8:4.15_0: They’re repelled by relishing, but not repelled.
ai-ps3.8:4.16_0: They’re disillusioned, dispassion, and cessation regarding dust. They don’t understand:
ai-ps3.8:4.18_0: Blue on impermanence, the perception of not-self in suffering gives up, and the perception of not-self. Being disillusioned, desire fades away, and cease.
ai-ps3.8:4.19_0: These are the seven body that they will pull up.
ai-ps3.8:4.22_0: Because of that mindfulness, that knowledge of the body, that’s how they proceed.
ai-ps3.8:4.24_0: “Those who revere the host of Kāsī.”
ai-ps3.8:5.1_0: And he distinguished the four kinds of development:
ai-ps3.8:5.2_0: So there they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that energy to develop mindfulness that has been developed.
ai-ps3.8:5.3_0: That’s how they meditate observing an aspect of the body.
ai-ps3.8:6.1_0: How do you meditate observing an aspect of the feelings that are felt sentiment while staying in the previous case?
ai-ps3.8:6.2_0: It’s when someone gives up pleasant feeling ...
ai-ps3.8:6.6_0: These are the seven feelings without feeling.
ai-ps3.8:6.9_0: The feeling they give rise to that knowledge.
ai-ps3.8:7.1_0: something may be developed and cultivated.
ai-ps3.8:7.3_0: It’s when someone feels painful feeling ...
ai-ps3.8:7.20_0: These are the seven feelings without feeling.
ai-ps3.8:7.23_0: The feeling they give rise to that knowledge.
ai-ps3.8:8.1_0: something may be developed and cultivated.
ai-ps3.8:8.2_0: so they meditate observing an aspect of feelings.
ai-ps3.8:9.1_0: how do they meditate observing an aspect of the mind?
ai-ps3.8:9.2_0: Take someone whose mind with greed as impermanent ...
ai-ps3.8:9.9_0: Their mindfulness is lost and perish.
ai-ps3.8:9.11_0: “Seeing your minds against the thought of going forth.”
ai-ps3.8:10.1_0: something may be developed and cultivated.
ai-ps3.8:11.1_0: Take someone whose mind is free of greed. ...
ai-ps3.8:11.2_0: mind with hate as “mind with hate”,
ai-ps3.8:11.3_0: and mind without hate as “mind without hate”;
ai-ps3.8:11.4_0: mind with delusion as “mind with delusion”,
ai-ps3.8:11.5_0: and mind without delusion as “mind without delusion”;
ai-ps3.8:11.10_0: mind that is not supreme as “mind that is not supreme”,
ai-ps3.8:11.11_0: and mind that is supreme as “mind that is supreme”;
ai-ps3.8:11.12_0: mind immersed in samādhi as “mind immersed in samādhi”,
ai-ps3.8:11.28_0: Their mindfulness is lost and perish.
ai-ps3.8:11.30_0: “Seeing your minds against the thought of going forth.”
ai-ps3.8:12.1_0: something may be developed and cultivated.
ai-ps3.8:12.3_0: That’s how they meditate observing an aspect of the mind.
ai-ps3.8:13.5_0: They’re repelled by relishing, but not repelled.
ai-ps3.8:13.9_0: Blue on impermanence, the perception of not-self in suffering gives up, and the perception of not-self. Being disillusioned, desire fades away, and cease.
ai-ps3.8:13.10_0: These are the seven principles they’ll fall apart.
ai-ps3.8:13.13_0: and they’ll give rise to knowledge of the teaching.
ai-ps3.8:14.1_0: And he distinguished the four kinds of development:
ai-ps3.8:14.2_0: So there they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that energy to develop mindfulness that has been developed.
